entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump I’m father of two daughters on the coronavirus front line. One in her second trimester is terrified of coronavirus for her baby. When I see Trump, Powell, and Mnuchin opening up without a plan and pounding TRILLIONS into FAKE markets, I see their priority and it’s not my family! https://t.co/LTRZmw9wVf
